document_api_meta.title: Get Marketplace Creator Performance
document_api_meta.env_desc: Get the Creator Affiliate's Marketplace information and performance metrics in the last 30 days.

request_header_param.name: x-tts-access-token
request_header_param.desc: The seller access_token value from [Get Access Token](https://partner.tiktokshop.com/docv2/page/678e3a3292b0f40314a92d75#Get%20Access%20Token%20API), when user_type = 0. Follow this [guide](https://partner.tiktokshop.com/docv2/page/678e3a344ddec3030b238fa0) to get seller access_token.

request_query_param.name: app_key
request_query_param.desc: Every single app will have a unique key. Please use the specific key assigned to your app.

request_query_param.name: sign
request_query_param.desc: Signature generated by gen algorithm. When you send API requests to TTS, you must sign them so that TTS can identify the senders.

request_query_param.name: timestamp
request_query_param.desc: Unix timestamp GMT (UTC+00:00). This timestamp is used across all API requests. Developers can use this convert to local time.

request_query_param.name: shop_cipher
request_query_param.desc:
Use this property to pass shop information in requesting the API. Failure in passing the correct value when requesting the API for cross-border shops will return incorrect response. 
Get by API [Get Authorization Shop](https://partner.tiktokshop.com/docv2/page/6507ead7b99d5302be949ba9?external_id=6507ead7b99d5302be949ba9)

response_param.name: code
response_param.desc: The success or failure status code returned in API response.

response_param.name: message
response_param.desc: The success or failure messages returned in API response. Reasons of failure will be described in the message.

response_param.name: request_id
response_param.desc: Request log

response_param.name: data
response_param.desc: Specific return information

response_param.name: ^creator
response_param.desc: Data associated with the creator's TikTok profile.

response_param.name: ^^username
response_param.desc: TikTok user name.

response_param.name: ^^nickname
response_param.desc: TikTok nickname.

response_param.name: ^^avatar
response_param.desc: Metadata and data associated with the creator's TikTok profile avatar.

response_param.name: ^^^url
response_param.desc: The URL for the creator's TikTok profile avatar.

response_param.name: ^^selection_region
response_param.desc: The region associated with the creator.

response_param.name: ^^bio_description
response_param.desc: The biography description associated with the creator.

response_param.name: ^^follower_count
response_param.desc: The creator's follower count.

response_param.name: ^^profile_tt_uri
response_param.desc: The URL for the creator's TikTok profile page.

response_param.name: ^^category_ids
response_param.desc: A list of category identifiers associated with the products for which the creator has created posts.

response_param.name: ^^top_collaborated_brand_ids
response_param.desc: A list of the top 10 brands with which the creator has previously collaborated.

response_param.name: ^^brand_collaboration_count
response_param.desc: The total number of brands with which the creator has previously collaborated.

response_param.name: ^^units_sold
response_param.desc: The total number of units sold. Units are indexed to SKU. Note that if the creator has not given permission for precise data sharing, this property will not be present.

response_param.name: ^^units_sold_range
response_param.desc: The range of minimum number of units sold to maximum number of units sold over the lifetime of the creator account. Note that this property is included if the target market is `US` only. Note that if the creator has not given permission for precise data sharing, these properties will not be present.

response_param.name: ^^^minimum_amount
response_param.desc: The lowest number of units sold.

response_param.name: ^^^maximum_amount
response_param.desc: The highest number of units sold.

response_param.name: ^^^formatted_range
response_param.desc: The formatted range of minimum number of units sold to maximum number of units sold over the lifetime of the creator account.

response_param.name: ^^gmv
response_param.desc: Gross merchandise value (GMV) metadata and data associated with the creator. Note that if the creator has not given permission for precise data sharing, these properties will not be present.

response_param.name: ^^^currency
response_param.desc: The currency code.

response_param.name: ^^^amount
response_param.desc: The total GMV associated with the creator.

response_param.name: ^^video_gmv
response_param.desc: The video GMV metadata and data associated with the creator. Note that if the creator has not given permission for precise data sharing, these properties will not be present.

response_param.name: ^^^currency
response_param.desc: The currency code.

response_param.name: ^^^amount
response_param.desc: The total video GMV associated with the creator.

response_param.name: ^^live_gmv
response_param.desc: Livestream GMV metadata and data associated with the creator. Note that if the creator has not given permission for precise data sharing, these properties will not be present.

response_param.name: ^^^currency
response_param.desc: The currency code.

response_param.name: ^^^amount
response_param.desc: Total livestream GMV associated with the creator.

response_param.name: ^^gmv_range
response_param.desc: The range of GMV values associated with this creator. Note that this property is included if the target market is `US` only. Note that if the creator has not given permission for precise data sharing, these properties will not be present.

response_param.name: ^^^currency
response_param.desc: The currency code.

response_param.name: ^^^minimum_amount
response_param.desc: The lowest GMV value.

response_param.name: ^^^maximum_amount
response_param.desc: The highest GMV value.

response_param.name: ^^^formatted_range
response_param.desc: The formatted range of GMV values associated with this creator.

response_param.name: ^^ec_live_engagement_rate
response_param.desc: E-commerce live stream engagement rate in hundredths of a percent. For example, `6000` is 60%.

response_param.name: ^^category_gmv_distribution
response_param.desc: GMV distribution by category.

response_param.name: ^^^category_id
response_param.desc: The top-level category identifier.

response_param.name: ^^^value
response_param.desc: GMV associated with the category in hundredths of a percent.

response_param.name: ^^content_gmv_distribution
response_param.desc: GMV associated with creator content by content type.

response_param.name: ^^^content_type
response_param.desc:
The content type. This an enumerated type with values: 
- VIDEO
- LIVE
- SHOWCASE

response_param.name: ^^^value
response_param.desc: Content GMV distribution value in hundredths of a percent.

response_param.name: ^^product_original_price_range
response_param.desc: Original promoted product price metadata and data associated with the creator.

response_param.name: ^^^currency
response_param.desc: The currency code.

response_param.name: ^^^minimum_amount
response_param.desc: The lowest original promoted product price.

response_param.name: ^^^maximum_amount
response_param.desc: The higest original promoted product price.

response_param.name: ^^gpm
response_param.desc: GMV per mille (GPM) metadata and data associated with the creator. Note that if the creator has not given permission for precise data sharing, these properties will not be present.

response_param.name: ^^^currency
response_param.desc: The currency code.

response_param.name: ^^^amount
response_param.desc: The GPM amount.

response_param.name: ^^live_gpm
response_param.desc: Livestream GMV per mille (GPM) metadata and data associated with the creator. Note that if the creator has not given permission for precise data sharing, these properties will not be present.

response_param.name: ^^^currency
response_param.desc: The currency code.

response_param.name: ^^^amount
response_param.desc: The livestream GPM amount.

response_param.name: ^^video_gpm
response_param.desc: Video GMV per mille (GPM) metadata and data associated with the creator. Note that if the creator has not given permission for precise data sharing, these properties will not be present.

response_param.name: ^^^currency
response_param.desc: The currency code.

response_param.name: ^^^amount
response_param.desc: The video GPM amount.

response_param.name: ^^gpm_range
response_param.desc: The range of GPM values associated with the creator. Note that this property is included if the target market is `US`. Note that if the creator has not given permission for precise data sharing, these properties will not be present.

response_param.name: ^^^currency
response_param.desc: The currency code.

response_param.name: ^^^minimum_amount
response_param.desc: The lowest GPM value.

response_param.name: ^^^maximum_amount
response_param.desc: The highest GPM value.

response_param.name: ^^^formatted_range
response_param.desc: The formatted range of GPM values associated with the creator.

response_param.name: ^^video_gpm_range
response_param.desc: The range of video GPM values associted with the creator. Note that this property is included if the target market is `US`. Note that if the creator has not given permission for precise data sharing, these properties will not be present.

response_param.name: ^^^currency
response_param.desc: The currency code.

response_param.name: ^^^minimum_amount
response_param.desc: The lowest video GPM value.

response_param.name: ^^^maximum_amount
response_param.desc: The highest video GPM value.

response_param.name: ^^^formatted_range
response_param.desc: The formatted range of video GPM values associted with the creator.

response_param.name: ^^live_gpm_range
response_param.desc: The range of livestream GPM values associted with the creator. Note that this property is included if the target market is `US` only. Note that if the creator has not given permission for precise data sharing, these properties will not be present.

response_param.name: ^^^currency
response_param.desc: The currency code.

response_param.name: ^^^minimum_amount
response_param.desc: The lowest livestream GPM value.

response_param.name: ^^^maximum_amount
response_param.desc: The highest livestream GPM value.

response_param.name: ^^^formatted_range
response_param.desc: The formatted range of livestream GPM values associted with the creator.

response_param.name: ^^promoted_product_num
response_param.desc: The number of promoted products associated with the creator.

response_param.name: ^^ec_live_count
response_param.desc: The number of e-commerce livestreams associated with the creator.

response_param.name: ^^ec_video_count
response_param.desc: The number of e-commerce video posts associated with the creator.

response_param.name: ^^avg_ec_video_play_count
response_param.desc: The average number of number of e-commerce video plays.

response_param.name: ^^avg_commission_rate
response_param.desc: The average commission rate in hundredths of a percent. Note that if the creator has not given permission for precise data sharing, these properties will not be present.

response_param.name: ^^avg_commission_rate_range
response_param.desc: The range of average commission rates associated with the creator. Note that if the creator has not given permission for precise data sharing, these properties will not be present.

response_param.name: ^^^minimum_amount
response_param.desc: The smallest average commission rate in hundredths of a percent.

response_param.name: ^^^maximum_amount
response_param.desc: The largest average commission rate in hundredths of a percent.

response_param.name: ^^avg_gmv_per_buyer
response_param.desc: Average GMV per buyer metadata and data associated with the creator. Note that this property is included if the target market is `US` only. Note that if the creator has not given permission for precise data sharing, these properties will not be present.

response_param.name: ^^^currency
response_param.desc: The currency code.

response_param.name: ^^^amount
response_param.desc: The average GMV per buyer amount.

response_param.name: ^^avg_gmv_per_buyer_range
response_param.desc: The range of average GMV per buyer associated with the creator. Note that this property is included if the target market is `US` only. Note that if the creator has not given permission for precise data sharing, these properties will not be present.

response_param.name: ^^^currency
response_param.desc: The currency code.

response_param.name: ^^^minimum_amount
response_param.desc: The smallest average GMV per buyer.

response_param.name: ^^^maximum_amount
response_param.desc: The largest average GMV per buyer.

response_param.name: ^^^formatted_range
response_param.desc: The formatted range of average GMV per buyer associated with the creator.

response_param.name: ^^avg_ec_live_view_count
response_param.desc: Average live stream views with promoted products.

response_param.name: ^^avg_ec_live_like_count
response_param.desc: Average e-commerce live stream likes.

response_param.name: ^^avg_ec_live_comment_count
response_param.desc: Average e-commerce live stream comments.

response_param.name: ^^avg_ec_live_share_count
response_param.desc: Average e-commerce live stream shares.

response_param.name: ^^avg_ec_video_like_count
response_param.desc: Average e-commerce video likes.

response_param.name: ^^avg_ec_video_comment_count
response_param.desc: Average e-commerce video comments.

response_param.name: ^^avg_ec_video_share_count
response_param.desc: Average e-commerce video shares.

response_param.name: ^^follower_location
response_param.desc: A list of key–value pairs representing the distribution of followers by location.

response_param.name: ^^^key
response_param.desc: The location, use [TWO-LETTER STATE AND TERRITORY ABBREVIATIONS](https://www.faa.gov/air_traffic/publications/atpubs/cnt_html/appendix_a.html)

response_param.name: ^^^value
response_param.desc: The proportion of followers from this location, expressed as a decimal (e.g., 0.3705 = 37.05%).

response_param.name: ^^follower_age
response_param.desc: A list of key–value pairs representing the distribution of followers by age range.

response_param.name: ^^^key
response_param.desc: The age range (e.g., "18–23").

response_param.name: ^^^value
response_param.desc: The proportion of followers in this age range, expressed as a decimal (e.g., 0.2500 = 25.00%).

response_param.name: ^^follower_gender
response_param.desc: A list of key–value pairs representing the distribution of followers by gender.

response_param.name: ^^^key
response_param.desc: The gender (e.g., "Male", "Female").

response_param.name: ^^^value
response_param.desc: The proportion of followers of this gender, expressed as a decimal (e.g., 0.5000 = 50.00%).

response_param.name: ^^pps
response_param.desc:
Promotion Performance Score (PPS)
The score reflects the quality of a creator's shoppable content and product selection over the past 90 days. A high score may indicate a better shopping experience, with fewer potential refunds or negative reviews.

response_param.name: ^^rating
response_param.desc: Rating from sellers who worked with this creator

response_param.name: ^^ec_video_engagement_rate
response_param.desc:
The number of post engagements (likes, shares, and comments) divided by the total video views averaged across the videos in the last 30 days.
For example, 3000 stands for 0.3 or 30%

error_code_list.msg: only affiliate partner cipher can access this api
this creator does't have e-commerce permission,please check the request params.
creator selection region doesn't match seller's region
This seller was unable to get official creator profile because of didn't have the permission.
The creator didn't didn't have e-commerce permissions or has been deactivated.
request is limited, please try agagin later
The query quota has been reached (10000 request per day). Please try again tomorrow.
Internal error. Please try again. If the issue persists after multiple attempts, please contact platform support.

sample_code.label: Go
Node.js
Java

scope_list.package_description: The application will be able to access the Creator Marketplace to find suitable Creators based on filters such as Creator category, ecomerce content performance, affiliate sales performance, and audience demographics.
scope_list.auth_info: The application will be able to access the Creator Marketplace on your behalf to find suitable Creators based on filters such as Creator category, ecommerce content performance, affiliate sales performance, and audience demographics.
